name: Bay Pond Partners
overview:
Wellington Management serves as an investment advisor to more than 1,500 institutions located in over 40 countries.

They are not brokers, lenders or underwriters. Their expertise is investments â€” from global equities and fixed income to currencies and commodities.

They like to describe themselves as a collection of teams that create solutions designed to respond to specific client needs. Their most distinctive strength is proprietary, independent research, which is shared across all areas of the organization and used only for managing clients’ portfolios.

Wellington Management Company, LLP is a private partnership. They exist solely to meet the needs of clients. An independent structure and collegial culture are two of the main reasons investment professionals join Wellington Management â€” and stay for their entire careers.
